Docs.typeparam: The type of the object to populate
Docs.param: An object that represents the context for the current operation.
Docs.summary: Reconstructs the complete object graph of type T using the flattened entity property dictionary and returns reconstructed object. The property dictionary may contain only basic properties, only nested properties or a mix of both types.
Docs.returns: The result containing the reconstructed object with its full object hierarchy.

public static System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string,Microsoft.Azure.CosmosDB.Table.EntityProperty> Flatten (object root, Microsoft.Azure.Storage.OperationContext operationContext);

.method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary`2<string, class Microsoft.Azure.CosmosDB.Table.EntityProperty> Flatten(object root, class Microsoft.Azure.Storage.OperationContext operationContext) cil managed
static member Flatten : obj * Microsoft.Azure.Storage.OperationContext -> System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary<string, Microsoft.Azure.CosmosDB.Table.EntityProperty>

public: static System::Collections::Generic::Dictionary<System::String ^, Microsoft::Azure::CosmosDB::Table::EntityProperty ^> ^ Flatten(System::Object ^ root, Microsoft::Azure::Storage::OperationContext ^ operationContext);

Docs.param: The object to flatten and convert.
An object that represents the context for the current operation.
Docs.summary: Traverses object graph, flattens and converts all nested (and not nested) properties to EntityProperties, stores them in the property dictionary. The keys are constructed by appending the names of the properties visited during pre-order depth first traversal from root to each end node property delimited by '_'. Allows complex objects to be stored in persistent storage systems or passed between web services in a generic way.
Docs.returns: The result containing of objects for all properties of the flattened root object.
